radiographic_examinations.findings: Multilevel degenerative changes, multiple enhancing lesions in the lumbar spine and left iliac bone, and compression fractures of the first and second lumbar vertebrae.

Reticulation in the subpleural region at the lung bases, bronchiolectasis, a small pleural effusion on the right side, generalized osteopenia, multiple lytic lesions throughout the spine and ribs, and multiple healed fractures.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings suggested progressive disease consistent with multiple myeloma.
